name: Dungeon Master Sheet
short_description:
This program is intended to assist Dungeon master in managing NPC's stats.

The program is currently only available on windows, and compiles well with: VS2010, VS2008, Sharpdev, and MonoDevelop (.net compile only. Not compatible for a mono build)

This app is pretty self explanatory but feel free to e-mail me with questions. I wrote it for the Weekly Dnd group. I originally carried multiples of this sheet with me to games just to keep track of NPC and heroes.

Features: able to keep tabs on upto 4 characters. ability modifiers are automaticaly set. tabbed sheets to allow multiple sheets
summary: This program is intended to assist DMs in managing NPC's stats.
